      • addTupleToAchievement

        public boolean addTupleToAchievement(java.lang.String playerId,
                            int achievementId,
                            java.lang.String value,
                            int completed)
                              throws DatabaseException
        Adds an achievement to the PLAYERACHIEVEMENTS table.
        Parameters:
        PlayerId - The player id
        AchievementId - the achievement id
        value - details about the current completion of the achievement
        completed - a boolean value >= 0 (0 == false)
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • isActive

        public int isActive(java.lang.String playerId,
           int achievementId)
             throws DatabaseException
        Returns a boolean value indicating if an achievement is in the DB for a particular player. ie, if a player has been started on an achievement, but is not yet completed
        Parameters:
        String - playerId The player id
        int - achievementId The achievement id
        Returns:
        1 if the achievement is active, 0 if it is not in the DB, and -1 if the achievement is already completed
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • getAchievementValue

        public java.lang.String getAchievementValue(java.lang.String playerId,
                                   int achievementId)
                                     throws DatabaseException
        Returns the value - ie status - of an achievement for a particular player
        Parameters:
        String - playerId The player id
        int - achievementId The achievement id
        Returns:
        String value The status of an achievement, or "INACTIVE" if the tuple is not in the table
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • isCompleted

        public int isCompleted(java.lang.String playerId,
              int achievementId)
                throws DatabaseException
        Returns a boolean value indicating if an achievement has been completed by a particular player.
        Parameters:
        String - playerId The player id
        int - achievementId The achievement id
        Returns:
        0 if achievement is yet to be completed, and any value if achievement has been completed already
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

        Parameters:

                                    throws DatabaseException
        Remove an achievement from a player in the PLAYERACHIEVEMENTS table.
        Parameters:
        PlayerID - The ID of the player to remove achievement from.
